pages.title: Signalum
pages.text: Signalum is an alloy made from Electrum, Redstone and Aluminum, and an alternative to Netherite.$(br)Tools and armor made of this material aren't as durable as their netherite counterpart, albeit keeping the same speed and strength. It has a very good enchantability.$(br2)DURABILITY: $(l)HIGH$()$(br)MINING SPEED: $(l)10$()$(br)ATTACK DAMAGE: $(l)8$()$(br)ENCHANTABILITY: $(l)VERY HIGH
To obtain tools and armor made out of Signalum, one must be smith Electrum gear with an Signalum Ingot.
